branchCategory.name: Solenoid Valve
branchCategory.description: <p>A selection of 2 and 3 port solenoid process valves designed for steam and heated water applications. </p>

branchItem.name: VX2*5, Single Unit, Direct Operated 2 Port Solenoid Valve for Steam
VXZ2*5, Pilot Operated, 2 Port Solenoid Valve for Heated Water, Single Unit
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>Body material: brass, and stainless steel <LI>Medium: heated water. Fluid temperature: 1 to 99°C <LI> Maximum pressure: 218 psi <LI>IP65 enclosure <LI>Valve type: Normally Closed, Normally Open</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: VXS2, Pilot Operated 2 Port Solenoid Valve for Steam
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>For use with steam <LI>Long service life: 3 million cycles <LI>Double guide rings to improve air filtration <LI>Reduced power consumption compared to previous version <LI>Port size 1/4 to 1 inch <LI>IP65 Enclosure</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: VXD2*5, Pilot Operated, 2 Port Solenoid Valve for Heated Water
VX3* Single Unit, Direct Operated 3 Port Solenoid Valve
